name: outline-mcp-server
description: An MCP server for interacting with Outline's API

scripts.build: node --input-type=module -e "import { rmSync } from 'node:fs'; rmSync('build', { recursive: true, force: true });" && tsc && chmod +x build/index.js && chmod +x build/stdio.js
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently -n build,run -c blue.bold,green.bold "tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "node --watch build/index.js"
scripts.watch:stdio: npm run build && concurrently -n build,run -c blue.bold,green.bold "tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "node --watch build/stdio.js"
scripts.run-dxt: npm run build && dotenv node build/dxt.js
